trustfund:
TF021035-PRIVATE SECT.DEVELOPMENT
            ADJUSTMENT LOAN,TF022500-PHRD-TRADE & PRIVATE SECTOR
            DEV. PROJ.

abstracts.cdata!:
The Private Sector Development
            Adjustment Loan Project will support the government's
            program to achieve rapid and sustained growth through
            private sector development.  Macroeconomic policies will
            primarily focus on strengthening fiscal adjustment.  Trade
            reform will reduce tariff protection in stages in accordance
            with the recently agreed Caribbean Community Common External
            Tariff, increasing international competitiveness and
            efficiency of enterprises.  The privatization program, which
            cuts across many sectors, will open new activities for the
            private sector, shift the government's role from
            commercial and industrial activities to the social sectors
            and reduce the fiscal burden of inefficient public
            enterprises.  Complementary legal, regulatory and
            administrative reforms will improve the business environment
            to accelerate output and export response. The loan will
            finance general imports, subject to certain restrictions.
